title: Here comes the sun
creator_credit: Clayton J. Edwards, Bastian Wimmer and Image Associates
brief_description: Four solar energy experiments have been set up by the National Science Foundation in four different school buildings in four different parts of the United States. The systems are located in Virginia, Maryland, Massachussetts and Minnesota, each utilising a basic system, but with slight differences in each unit.
